Unauthorized person attempting to enter campus grounds at 3:45 PM. Captured on CCTV. Security team alerted and person was escorted out.

history.note: Security team dispatched to main gate
Person identified and escorted out. ID verified and added to watchlist.

description: Vehicle alarm triggered at 9:30 PM. CCTV footage shows two individuals attempting to break into a staff member's car. Police were called. Vehicle not damaged.

history.note: Security team reached location. Suspects fled the scene.
Area secured. CCTV footage recorded and handed to police.
Police investigation ongoing. Campus security increased.

description: Graffiti found on walls in boys hostel corridor. CCTV footage reviewed - incident occurred at 2:15 AM. Student identified.

history.note: CCTV footage reviewed. Perpetrator identified as student ID 20210045
Case assigned to Dean of Students for disciplinary action
Student counseled. Agreed to restoration work. Case closed.

description: Individual observed in restricted area at 4:20 AM via CCTV. Lab door access logs don't match. Campus security responded. Person was visiting professor who forgot ID access.

history.note: CCTV alert - Person in restricted research lab area
Person identified as visiting professor. Verified identity and credentials.
Access credentials issued. Training provided on security protocols.

description: CCTV shows small fire in kitchen equipment at 12:15 PM. Staff quickly extinguished using fire extinguisher. No injuries. Equipment sent for maintenance.

history.note: Fire alarm triggered in cafeteria kitchen
Fire department alerted. Security team dispatched.
Kitchen staff extinguished fire using fire extinguisher.
Fire department inspected area. All clear.
Faulty equipment replaced. Kitchen reopened for service.
